condition.set: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk.All_Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" by All_Risk.risk_object, All_Risk.risk_object_type, All_Risk.threat_object, All_Risk.threat_object_type | rename All_Risk.* as * | search threat_object=* | table risk_object risk_object_type threat_object threat_object_type | eval threat_object = replace (threat_object , "\"" , "") | eval orig_threat_object=threat_object | eval threat_object=if(len(threat_object) > 25,substr(threat_object,1,25)."...",threat_object) |dedup risk_object, risk_object_type, threat_object | eval from=risk_object, to=threat_object, type=risk_object_type | appendpipe [| eval from=threat_object, to="", type=threat_object_type] | lookup attack_web_viz type as type | eval linktext=threat_object_type | rename viz as type | eval value=orig_threat_object |search NOT risk_object="system"

| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk.All_Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" OR All_Risk.threat_object IN
[|tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk.All_Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" by All_Risk.threat_object | fields All_Risk.threat_object | mvcombine All_Risk.threat_object delim="\",\"" | nomv All_Risk.threat_object | rename All_Risk.threat_object as search | eval search="(\"".search."\")"] by All_Risk.risk_object, All_Risk.risk_object_type, All_Risk.threat_object, All_Risk.threat_object_type | rename All_Risk.* as * | search threat_object=* | table risk_object risk_object_type threat_object threat_object_type | eval threat_object = replace (threat_object , "\"" , "") | eval orig_threat_object=threat_object | eval threat_object=if(len(threat_object) > 25,substr(threat_object,1,25)."...",threat_object) |dedup risk_object, risk_object_type, threat_object | eval from=risk_object, to=threat_object, type=risk_object_type | appendpipe [| eval from=threat_object, to="", type=threat_object_type] | lookup attack_web_viz type as type | eval linktext=threat_object_type | rename viz as type | eval value=orig_threat_object |search NOT risk_object="system"

| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk.All_Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" OR All_Risk.risk_object IN [| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk.All_Risk where All_Risk.threat_object IN [|tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk.All_Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" by All_Risk.threat_object | fields All_Risk.threat_object | mvcombine All_Risk.threat_object delim="\",\"" | nomv All_Risk.threat_object | rename All_Risk.threat_object as search | eval search="(\"".search."\")"] by All_Risk.risk_object | fields All_Risk.risk_object | mvcombine All_Risk.risk_object delim="," | nomv All_Risk.risk_object | rename All_Risk.risk_object as search | eval search="(".search.")"] by All_Risk.risk_object, All_Risk.risk_object_type, All_Risk.threat_object, All_Risk.threat_object_type | rename All_Risk.* as * | search threat_object=* | table risk_object risk_object_type threat_object threat_object_type | eval threat_object = replace (threat_object , "\"" , "") | eval orig_threat_object=threat_object | eval threat_object=if(len(threat_object) > 25,substr(threat_object,1,25)."...",threat_object) |dedup risk_object, risk_object_type, threat_object | eval from=risk_object, to=threat_object, type=risk_object_type | appendpipe [| eval from=threat_object, to="", type=threat_object_type] | lookup attack_web_viz type as type | eval linktext=threat_object_type | rename viz as type | eval value=orig_threat_object |search NOT risk_object="system"

search.query: |inputlookup asset_lookup_by_str|search asset="$field_risk_object$"| appendcols [|from datamodel:"Risk"."All_Risk" |search risk_object="$field_risk_object$" risk_object_type="system"|stats sum(calculated_risk_score) as "Agg Risk Score"]

|inputlookup identity_lookup_expanded |search identity="$field_risk_object$"| eval startDate=strftime(startDate,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S")| appendcols [|from datamodel:"Risk"."All_Risk" |search risk_object="$field_risk_object$" risk_object_type="user"|stats sum(calculated_risk_score) as "Agg Risk Score"]

|tstats `summariesonly` values(All_Risk.risk_factor_mult_matched) as risk_factor_mult_matched values(All_Risk.risk_factor_add_matched) as risk_factor_add_matched from datamodel=Risk.All_Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" by All_Risk.risk_object|eval risk_factors = mvappend('risk_factor_mult_matched', 'risk_factor_add_matched')|table risk_factors

| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" source="*" by All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic _time span=15m |rename "All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic" as tactics | timechart cont=FALSE span=15m sum(count) as count by tactics

| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" source="*" by All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique _time span=15m |rename "All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique" as techniques | timechart cont=FALSE span=15m sum(count) as count by techniques

| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" source="*" by All_Risk.threat_object_type _time span=15m |rename "All_Risk.threat_object_type" as threats | timechart cont=FALSE span=15m sum(count) as count by threats

| tstats `summariesonly` count sum(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as "Aggregate Score" avg(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as "Average Score" from datamodel=Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" source="*" by All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic

| tstats `summariesonly` count sum(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as "Aggregate Score" avg(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as "Average Score" from datamodel=Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" source="*" by All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique

| tstats `summariesonly` count sum(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as "Aggregate Score" avg(All_Risk.calculated_risk_score) as "Average Score" from datamodel=Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" source="*" by All_Risk.threat_object_type

| tstats `summariesonly` count values(source) as source from datamodel=Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" source="*" by All_Risk.risk_message, _time span=15m |rename "All_Risk.risk_message" as risk_message |eval risk_message=if(len(risk_message)>150,substr(risk_message,1,150)."..<cut>",risk_message) | eval source=replace(source,"^.*?-\sRR\s-\s(.*?)\s-\s\w+?\s-\sRule","\1") | table _time source risk_message threat_object | eval start=_time, label=source, tooltip=risk_message, data=threat_object | dedup _time label

panel.title: Rules Triggered for the Risk Object (earliest time at top)

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` count min(_time) as _time values(All_Risk.risk_object) as risk_object from datamodel=Risk where All_Risk.risk_object="$field_risk_object$" source="*" by source, All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic |rename "All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic" as "ATT&CK Tactic" | eval Rule=replace(source,"^.*?-\sRR\s-\s(.*?)\s-\s\w+?\s-\sRule","\1") |stats values("ATT&CK Tactic") as "ATT&CK Tactic" values(count) as count min(_time) as firstSeen values(risk_object) as risk_object by Rule, _time, source |lookup drilldown_searches.csv source |eval drilldown_search=replace(drilldown_search,"REPLACEME",risk_object) |sort firstSeen

table.title: <click to drilldown to pivot to new risk object>

search.query: |tstats `summariesonly` count, values(All_Risk.src) as src, values(All_Risk.dest) as dest, values(source) as source, values(All_Risk.risk_object_type) as risk_object_type values(All_Risk.user) as user from datamodel=Risk.All_Risk where All_Risk.user="$field_risk_object$" OR All_Risk.dest="$field_risk_object$" OR All_Risk.src="$field_risk_object$" OR All_Risk.threat_object="$field_risk_object$" All_Risk.risk_object!="$field_risk_object$" by All_Risk.risk_object|rename "All_Risk.risk_object" as risk_object|rex field=source "^.*?.-.RR.-.(?<Rule>.*?).-.\w+.-.Rule$"|fields - source|sort - count
